title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 83-2.7 - Recordkeeping
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 83-2.7 - Recordkeeping

State Regulations

The department shall maintain on file each cooperative agreement for which a certificate of public advantage is in effect and a copy of the certificate, including any conditions imposed on it. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
83-2.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
